title: -Hwindowsgui no longer a valid flag?
body:
by **alski85**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
C:\go\>go build -ldflags="-Hwindowsgui" filename.go


2. What is the full compiler output?
# command-line-arguments
C:\Go\pkg\tool\windows_386\8l.exe: unknown flag -Hwindowsgui

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
go version devel +d58997478ec6 Mon Apr 08 00:09:35 2013 -0700 windows/386

I notice Hwindowsgui is not an executable header option also in ld\lib.h.  Has it been
removed?  Apologies in advance if this is filed in incorrect section.
